#include<stdio.h>
int main()
{
    int testcase;
    long long number1,number2,i,soul;
    scanf("%d",&testcase);
    while(testcase--)
    {
        scanf("%lld",&number1);
       soul=1;
        for(i=0; i<number1; i++)
        {
            scanf("%lld",&number2);
            // we want remainder and then multiply it
            // Logic
            soul=(soul*number2) % 1000000007;
        }
        printf("%lld\n",soul);
    }
    return 0;
}
